document.bingtitle: Fried Chicken, Fried Fish, Fast Food Restaurant | Petersburg, VA
document.webtitle: Fried Chicken, Fried Fish, Fast Food Restaurant | Petersburg, VA
document.description: Enjoy the delicious fried chicken, fried fish, and other menu items from our fast food restaurant in Petersburg, Virginia.
document.body:
Golden Skillet cookin' up down home cookin'™ Home Fast Food Menu Coupon Catering Location Comments Applications Contact Us
Menu
Look at our menu and decide what you want...... Come up with a different combination for your family lunch or dinner.... Try our delicious Chicken or our fried fish cooked to order.... Have a taste for a sandwich...Try our signature special, the Big Skillet sandwich or Our Hand Breaded Fish Sandwich or Spicy Chicken Sandwich.... Want something spicy.... Try our Hot wings or the Boneless Hot wings...... Try our scrumpcious Liver and Gizzards freshly cooked when you order........ Can't decide......Take a look at the menu below and choose your favorite........
Click here for a printable menu
Golden Skillet
1228 West Washington Street
Petersburg , Virginia 23803
